item.description: Welcome to my blog, d2h.net. Here you will stuff that I find interesting, useful, or noteworthy for some reason or other — in short, stuff the cat dragged in, or the sea delivered to our doorsteps. This blog is built using hugo, emacs, a derivative of the smigle hugo theme, the computer modern typewriter font, and the special elite typewriter font, and is hosted via github. item.title: Full Circle
item.description: OK, I’m back to where I started, blog-wise: statically generated content. The first incarnation of d2h.net was using an emacs generated blog, this time round I’ve ended up with using hugo. The workflow is a bit different now from back then: content is contained in a self-hosted gitea instance, which is feeding into a self-hosted drone instance, all docker-ized.
